summary: Team discussed how to use LangGraph to build modular RAG workflows for internal knowledge retrieval. Agreed to use FAISS for vector storage and metadata filters for query refinement.
follow_ups: Charlie will prototype LangGraph node definitions for metadata search.
Dana will prepare a FAISS index using sample documents.
action_items: Test query filtering using meta-level embeddings.
Prepare dummy JSON data for system testing.

conversation.speaker: Dana
conversation.text: We can store meta data separately from fine-grained chunks.

conversation.speaker: Charlie
conversation.text: Exactly. That helps reduce search space.
